tasks.name: Create src/lib/github/commits.ts with formatStageCommitMessage function
tasks.report: Created commits.ts with formatStageCommitMessage function that returns title and body with git trailers

tasks.name: Add createStageApprovalCommit function with git add and commit logic
tasks.report: Implemented createStageApprovalCommit using git add -A, git commit, and git rev-parse HEAD pattern from complete.ts

tasks.name: Add hasUncommittedChanges helper function
tasks.report: Added hasUncommittedChanges using git status --porcelain check

tasks.name: Export functions from src/lib/github/index.ts
tasks.report: Added export for commits.ts in src/lib/github/index.ts

tasks.name: Add commit_sha field to StageApproval type in src/lib/types.ts
tasks.report: Added commit_sha?: string field to stage approval metadata in ApprovalMetadata.stages type

tasks.name: Add auto_commit_on_approval to GitHubConfig type in src/lib/github/types.ts
tasks.report: Added auto_commit_on_approval: boolean field to GitHubConfig interface

tasks.name: Update DEFAULT_GITHUB_CONFIG with auto_commit_on_approval default true
Modify approve.ts to call createStageApprovalCommit after stage approval
tasks.report: Modified approve.ts to call createStageApprovalCommit after stage approval when GitHub integration enabled and auto_commit_on_approval is true

tasks.name: Store commit SHA in stage approval metadata
tasks.report: Added storeStageCommitSha function to approval.ts and integrated it into approve.ts to store commit SHA in stage approval metadata

tasks.name: Create src/lib/git/log.ts with parseGitLog function
tasks.report: Created src/lib/git/log.ts with parseGitLog function using custom git log format with delimiters. Includes ParsedCommit and WorkstreamTrailers interfaces.

tasks.name: Add extractWorkstreamTrailers function to parse commit trailers
tasks.report: extractWorkstreamTrailers function already implemented in log.ts. Parses Stream-Id, Stage, Batch, Thread, and Task trailers from commit messages using regex patterns.

tasks.name: Add groupCommitsByStage function to organize commits
tasks.report: groupCommitsByStage function already implemented in log.ts. Filters commits by streamId, groups by stage number, and returns sorted CommitsByStage array.

tasks.name: Add identifyHumanCommits function to find non-workstream commits
tasks.report: identifyHumanCommits function already implemented in log.ts. Filters commits that have no workstream trailers using hasWorkstreamTrailers helper.

tasks.name: Export functions from src/lib/git/index.ts
tasks.report: Created src/lib/git/index.ts exporting all log parsing functions and types. Module builds and imports correctly with bun.

tasks.name: Create src/cli/review-commits.ts with CLI argument parsing
tasks.report: Implemented complete review-commits CLI command with argument parsing, human-readable and JSON output formats, stage filtering, and file change display. Registered in bin/work.ts.
